channel.title: Send Me To Sleep (A Song to Fall Asleep To) - Alistair Webster
channel.description:
https://gbmmusicuk.bandcamp.com/track/send-me-to-sleep-a-song-to-fall-asleep-to
I'm absolutely loving the portability of Auxy, and used it to make the majority of this piece of music, which has been designed to help people drift off to sleep.
You can read an interview with a little more about the track, and the ideas behind it here: https://www.leftlion.co.uk/read/2018/may/alistair-webster-gmb-music-to-sleep-to-interview/
